div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 562 Rentzi (Rrenc, Gajtan), near Shkodër, (860) Albania, 1900 Burial: late 2nd cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 8+ AE Scodra: 5 Genthius 2 Ballaeus: 1 Unc. + Disposition: dispersed † Scholz, MonatsblNumGesWien 1901, pp. 123-7, illus. Islami, Studia Albanica 1 (1966), pp. 225-49, passim Noe erroneously included other coins in the hd.
